entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Fog dissipating early this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4 except minus 8 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4 except minus 8 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
